abstract: Despite the company’s strong performance, shares fell close to 10 percent in after-hours trading after the earnings release.
snippet: Despite the company’s strong performance, shares fell close to 10 percent in after-hours trading after the earnings release.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — A tepid forecast from Cisco Systems on Wednesday sent the tech giant’s shares down sharply during after-hours trading and shook Wall Street’s confidence that the economy is recovering.

headline.main: Cisco Reports Higher Profit But Sees Some Weaknesses
headline.print_headline: Cisco Reports Higher Profit But Sees Some Weaknesses
